column4: when wayland goes live in ubuntu, will wine gaming still be possible?
so will ubuntu wait for at least a stable wayland release (stable in a sense that wine and most common apps will run flawlessly) or will they just go ahead and let developers adjust? haha
because the way I understand it is ubuntu won't have Xorg out of the box when they shift to wayland.
if history tells us anything, ubuntu does not wait for things to be stable - "progress" is driving force (for better or worse)
